text: enre janannale, bhumiyil mikaccunilkkunnavar enna nilayil inn adhipatyam ninnalkk tanne. ennal allahuvinre siksa namukk vannal atil ninn nam'me raksiccu sahayikkan arunt‌? phir'aun parannu: nan (sariyayi) kanunna margam matraman nan ninnalkk kaniccutarunnat‌. sariyaya margattilekkallate nan ninnale nayikkukayilla
